sections.title: Verse 1
content: O brothers of Christ Jesus, united we stand,
One faith, one Lord, one covenant of love;
In Him we are chosen, by grace we are called,
To walk in His light, to follow His way.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: O brothers of Christ Jesus, let love be your bond,
In peace and in service, in prayer and in praise;
The cross is our glory, the tomb is our gain,
For Christ lives forever, the first and the last.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: O brothers of Christ Jesus, go make disciples,
Baptize in the name of the Father above;
The Spirit will guide you, the truth shall be known,
Till all nations proclaim: 'Christ Jesus is Lord!'
